snippet: In addition to getting more than $150,000 for winning the Polar Music Prize, Chuck Berry and Peter Sellars will meet the King of Sweden.
abstract: In addition to getting more than $150,000 for winning the Polar Music Prize, Chuck Berry and Peter Sellars will meet the King of Sweden.

headline.main: Chuck Berry and Peter Sellars Win Polar Music Prize
headline.print_headline: A Rocker and a Director Win Polar Music Prize
